name: Phonebook
about: For instance, my Phonebook project. For it I drew inspiration from an image I admired, extracted its colors and integrated them into the overall layout. With this Phonebook app, you can add names and phone numbers, perform quick search, and delete entries as needed.
notes: But I also enjoy creating UI designs of different styles and color schemes.

name: To Do List
about: It all began with a To-Do List project. In this application, you can add and delete tasks and lists, as well as mark tasks as important and completed. All data is stored in Local Storage.
notes: You might have noticed that I love neon colors and dark themes.

name: Music Box
about: Take this music search app, for example. It uses Genius API to find songs and display the results. I enjoy solving complex problems and tackling challenging tasks because I believe it helps me grow professionally.
notes: At some point I really got into exploring fullstack and backend development. I built the backend for some of my projects and had fun deploying them to Heroku and later to Render.

name: Streaming App (WIP)
about: With this app, you can log in using your GitHub account, search for music, play tracks, and even add songs to your favourites.
notes: I enjoy retrowave, synthwave, and electronic music. It led me to create a Streaming App project where you can listen to it.

name: Browser game "Escaping Duck"
about:
I enjoy playing video games, and this game is something I created while exploring new technologies and ways to work with them, such as Circuit Playground, Python, and Three.js.
In this game, the input volume level is measured and dynamically affects the player's speed.
notes: Before that I studied Frontend Development at Hyper Island and here are some projects that I've created along the way.

about:
There I was developing UI interfaces for e-commerce projects with leading Nordic brands like Mini Rodini, Astrid Lindgren, RÃ¶hnisch, EQPE, Xlash, Stronger, and others.
Built and maintained a reusable UI component library using React, TypeScript, and Tailwind. Collaborated with designers and backend developers to implement new features and enhance the user experience.
notes: For the past two years I've been working as a Frontend Developer at Made People in Stockholm.
